articles.author: Dartunorro Clark
articles.title: America's global image under Biden skyrockets compared to Trump, survey finds - NBC News
articles.description: America’s reputation on the global stage appears to have had a significant rebound since former President Trump left office and President Joe Biden became the commander in chief, according to a Pew Research Study released on Thursday.
articles.content: Americas reputation on the global stage appears to have had a significant rebound since former President Donald Trump left office and President Joe Biden became the commander in chief, according to a… [+3523 chars]

articles.title: Drop in childhood vaccinations during pandemic may raise risk of other outbreaks when schools reopen, CDC says - The Washington Post
articles.description: The American Academy of Pediatrics calls on parents to get their children up-to-date on shots before they return to class.

articles.author: The Sun
articles.title: Simon Cowell set for charity walk after recovering from broken back - Page Six
articles.description: The “America’s Got Talent” judge, 61, broke his back last year in an electric bike accident at his home in Malibu.
articles.content:
Simon Cowell is set to do his first-ever charity walk after “recovering 110 percent” from his broken back, it’s been reported.

articles.author: CNA
articles.title: El Salvador approves law to make bitcoin legal tender - CNA
articles.description: The Congress of El Salvador has approved a law that will classify Bitcoin as legal tender in the Central American country, its president said, making it the world's first nation to adopt a cryptocurrency.
